name: Buddy's Busy

ingredients.item: Hot-brewed Davids Tea Pumpkin Chai black tea (or any chai)

preparation:
Add heavy whipping cream to an empty bottle, and shake until lightly whipped for about 1 minute.
Add the bourbon, liqueurs, honey, lemon juice and hot tea to a mug.
Top the drink with the whipped cream, and garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
